Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.scenes.utils

Class CSS

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.scenes.utils.CSS
public class CSS
extends java.lang.Object
Brief utility usable to produce various types of JavaFX-CSS fragments and combine them smartly through unwrapping and consequent re-wrapping

    CSS()

    Brief merges two CSS dictionaries by putting each entry of the second one in the first one
